com.facebook.buck.cli

Class AbstractPerfCommand<CommandContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.CommandWithPluginManager
      • com.facebook.buck.cli.AbstractCommand
        • com.facebook.buck.cli.AbstractPerfCommand<CommandContext>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PerfActionGraphCommand, PerfManifestCommand, PerfMbrPrepareRemoteExecutionCommand, PerfMbrSerializationCommand, PerfRuleKeyCommand

    public abstract class AbstractPerfCommand<CommandContext>
extends AbstractCommand
    This is the core of our perf commands, it handles the outer prepare + loop and statistics gathering.
